comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: W. F. Baker was team president of the Phillies at this time.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The photo was taken in New York City, where the team owners' association met, on December 9 and 10, 1913, to hold a formal election of Pennsylvania Governor John K. Tener, a former ball player, as the new President of the National League.

Another photo shows the group assembled in a New York hotel ballroom:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4605960693/in/set-72157603624867509/]

Harry Stevens, concessionaire, and August "Garry" Herrmann, owner of the Cincinnati Reds:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4627029952/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 28736150@N07
comment._content: amazing how sharp these old photos are  .....
